Duncan Garner: My dad and grandfather died young, so turning 50 scares the daylights out of me https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-listener/life/duncan-garner-my-dad-and-grandfather-died-young-so-turning-50-scares-the-daylights-out-of-我/ZK3XRHN5JNAOBGDGFRTSO7KN44/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-listener/life/duncan-garner-my-dad-and-grandfather-died-young-so-turning-50-scares-the-daylights-out-of-我/ZK3XRHN5JNAOBGDGFRTSO7KN44/ Duncan Garner“I'm 50 and feel ready to launch. Launch what is the bit I can't answer.” Fri, 08 Mar 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Duncan Garner: "I no longer strive for big houses, boats, cars and baches (maybe I'm lying about the boat bit). Now, I am desperate to create memories and real-life adventures … the kids will remember when it’s time to pull the plug.” Photo / Supplied
